main event: A sighting of an unidentified flying object (UFO) on 8 August 1952 at Elmendorf A.F.B., Alaska, reported by a C.A.A. employee
interesting points: The UFO was described as having a yellowish greenish flame and following a parabolic course from northwest to southeast
It appeared to be 23 to 34 degrees above the east horizon and made no noise
It disintegrated 93 degrees true from the reporting unit
A US Geological Survey team also reported hearing a noise like distant thunder at the same time as the sighting
Aerial recon was underway following the sighting
sighted object: yellowish greenish flame following a parabolic course
